summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4303 for the improvement of Edgar Street, from 11th Avenue North to 12th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51075, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
